question: im married since 2years and still i and my huaband dont understand eachother i have a son.What should i do?
answer:
QUESTION
ive been married since 2 yrs and my husband is not satiafied with me at all he keeps complaining about me he doesnt like the food i cook and scolds me also he criticizes me of my looks and tells me that he will leave me and take away my son from me im very tensed please tell me what to do i feel someone has done blackmagic on us im very upset
ANSWER


Share:
We suggest you have a heart to heart talk with him. A sound marriage is
based on good communication between the spouses. When he is in a good mood
for talking, broach this subject in a very affectionate and polite manner
and explain what your predicament is. Insha Allah, better communication will
lead to better understanding of each other.

Also, perform 2 Rakaat Salaatul-Haajat and beg Allah Ta'ala to assist you.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.
